body.value: <font color="lightgrey">There's no French word for gumbo. Because the concept doesn't exist, because the experience doesn't exist, because the ingredients don't exist. So you make it as best you possibly can in this other environment, but you have to call it gumbo. That's what it is. And... and yet there's a layering that takes place there. There's a layering of experience, and a layering of language.</font>
